Learning Today,
Leading the Space Sector Tomorrow

Empowering the next generation of sustainable space leaders through expert-led training, practical tools, and interdisciplinary learning.

Get Started

Developing Skills for a Responsible Space Future

Green Orbit Academy equips professionals, students, and organisations with the knowledge and tools needed to thrive in an evolving space economy. Our programmes blend evidence-based learning with practical application, ensuring every participant can turn insight into meaningful impact.

  • Hands-on training designed to build confidence and capability
  • Expert-led sessions connecting sustainability, innovation, and space industry practice
  • Engaging, accessible learning resources created for all stages of the space career journey

Through our workshops, courses, and learning pathways, we help you develop the skills to contribute to a safer, more sustainable, and more equitable space sector.

Why Choose Green Orbit Academy?

Green Orbit Academy provides learning experiences built for the future of the space sector. Every course, workshop, and resource is designed to help professionals, students, and organisations develop the skills needed to operate responsibly, sustainably, and strategically in an evolving space ecosystem. We combine industry expertise, evidence-based teaching, and practical application to create training that delivers real-world impact.

Learn More

Evidence-Led Learning

Our programmes are grounded in the latest research and industry standards, giving you actionable insights you can apply immediately in your work.

Practical Skills for Real Challenges

We focus on hands-on learning — from sustainability reporting to strategic communication — so you leave with capabilities, not just concepts.

Designed for a Sustainable Space Future

Each course helps you understand and navigate environmental, ethical, and strategic considerations shaping tomorrow’s space economy.

Learning Opportunities

Explore Our Courses, Workshops, and Masterclasses

Professional Courses

Structured programmes designed to enhance sector-specific skills. Build expertise in digital marketing, web development, content creation, and more.

Hands-on Workshops

Interactive sessions to apply learning in real-world contexts. Explore branding strategy, sustainable marketing, campaign planning, and storytelling.

Advanced Masterclasses

Deep-dive sessions led by industry experts. Develop strategic insight and advanced skills in communications, space & sustainability, and AI & digital transformation.

Ryan Laird

Founder, Green Orbit Academy

Ryan leads the Academy within the Impact Orbit Creative Group, shaping its vision for capability-building across the global impact and sustainability landscape. His work focuses on developing practical learning pathways that empower organisations, startups, and mission-driven teams to adopt robust impact frameworks, improve measurement practices, and integrate responsible innovation into everyday operations.

With a background spanning sustainable marketing, space-sector strategy, and ecosystem development, Ryan designs Academy programmes that blend industry expertise with accessible learning formats—helping participants translate complex concepts into actionable skills. Through his leadership, the Academy serves as a hub for knowledge, training, and professional development and wider community outreach initiatives.

Get in touch

Explore how Green Orbit Academy can support your professional development or organisational capability building. Connect with us to discuss learning opportunities tailored to your needs.
